title: Pictures at an Exhibition pedal point

The nonharmonic tone featured in the bass throughout the entire excerpt can best be described as

unit.text: 6: Harmony and Voice Leading III - Embellishments, Motives, and Melodic Devices

topic.text: 6.3: Embellishing Tones - Identifying Anticipations, Escape Tones, Appoggiaturas, and Pedal Points

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in performed music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
